description:
Hot springs have been found on Inspiration School Grounds, and a giant
hot springs town has been built!
But there`s only a moment`s rest to be had before the third year
students have the first years hold an orientation tournament between
classes!
The first round is to plan an event in the hot springs down.
Way behind after class 2 holds an Utae concert, Taketo fights back with a series of erotic carnival games! And amidst the chaos, the girls start to come to terms with their
feelings for Taketo...
Source: crunchyroll
